2068100.name: Ultimate Fishing® Online
2068100.description:
Ultimate Fishing® Online is a free-to-play multiplayer fishing simulator focused on fishing, realism, fun, and seamless social gameplay. Whether you're a solo angler or teaming up with friends, this immersive fishing experience lets you fish, compete, and explore in a living world packed with dynamic AI fish behavior and environmental effects.

Play with Friends

Choose between first-person or third-person views and join public or private multiplayer sessions with up to 16 players. Cast your line in diverse fisheries worldwide, each featuring unique species and conditions. Use techniques like float, spinning, casting, bottom, fly fishing, and even trolling once you're on the boat!

Fish AI

Fish AI behavior changes based on time of day, weather, bait type, and angling style. Whether you're trying to outsmart wary predators, observe massive schools of fish, or manage your gear to avoid breakage during a high-stakes catch, each moment is driven by skill and strategy. Underwater life feels alive with enormous shoals of up to 5,000 fish moving as a group.

Each fish scatters when disturbed by boats, casts, or predators, and regroups over time, creating a living, reactive fishing environment that constantly changes.

Even your bait landing too close can ruin a perfect catch, so timing and positioning matter.

It's all about Fishing

With a deep inventory system, gear customization, in-game economy, and realistic water physics - including tension-based line mechanics and damageable rods and reels - you’re not just playing a fishing game. You’re living the angler's life.

Game Features:

  • Free-to-play multiplayer with support for up to 16 players

  • Realistic fish behavior, including predators and school reactions

  • 45+ species including perch, zander, trout, pike, bass, catfish, and more!

  • Float, spinning, casting, bottom, and fly fishing

  • Boat travel and trolling

  • Underwater camera to observe bait and fish reactions

  • Vast fishing gear catalog

  • Equipment wear and tear system with repair mechanics

  • Dynamic weather and day/night cycle that impacts fish behavior

  • Global maps (USA, Europe, etc.) with unique species per location

  • First-person and third-person camera options

  • Player customization and emote system
2068100.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 韩语, 波兰语, 俄语, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
